onna blog adawiyak hadana hati kiyala dena post wala 4 weni eka dannayi me hadanne.mama me tharam dewal danna nam hithagen hitiye naha.eeth me lipi walata labunu kament dakkama noliya inna bari wuna.ee kament mata loku hayiyak wuna.ithin me post ekata eyita wada kament hambaweyi kiyala hithanawa.mama issella post ekedi kament danna kiyala dunnata thamange blog ekata kawuruhari dapu kament ekak balana hati kiwwe nahane.ithin api eeka karana hati balamu.

yapanaya ardhadwipaye weralashritha pradeshaye thawath dawantha hamuda kandawurak idikirimata sudanam wanabawa wartha weyi. 1990 sita kumpayimedu naminja namkala mema pradeshaye danata pawul 30 pamana jiwathwethi. 2009 warshayedi yuddhaya nimawimath samagama thawath hamuda kandawurak mema pradeshaye pihituwimata thiranaya kala athara dan ehi wadakatayuthu aarambha kirimata sudanam bawa wartha weyi.
